LightningComponentBundle.description: Displays the output of a referenced Apex funciton for a specified ID. Can be used on most pages.

property.name: contextId
property.label: Override Page Record Id
property.description: Will default to the page record ID if avaliable, but can be manually overwritten or specified here

property.name: logicReference
property.label: API name of logic to call
property.description: Reference apex will use to delected with funciton to get data from

property.name: title
property.label: List title
property.description: What text will display before the record count at the top of the component

property.name: iconName
property.label: Icon Name
property.description: Icon reference from SLDS framework e.g. standard:account

property.name: pageSpecifiedColumnNames
property.label: Override Columns (comma seperated list)
property.description: Field names provided in display order. Columns must be prespecified in Apex logic

property.name: maxRowSelection
property.label: Maximum Row Selection
property.description: Maximum number of rows that can be selected. Leave empty for unlimited selection.

property.name: maxHeight
property.label: Maximum Height (px)
property.description: Maximum height of the list in pixels. Leave empty to allow natural height.

property.name: title
property.label: List title
property.description: What text will display before the record count at the top of the component

property.name: iconName
property.label: Icon Name
property.description: TIcon reference from SLDS framework e.g. standard:account

property.name: isFlowMode
property.label: Enable Flow Mode
property.description: Set to 'true' to provide data directly from the Flow.

property.name: logicReference
property.label: Logic Reference (Apex Function)
property.description: Reference to Apex function to call for data. If specified, will use Apex instead of input strings.

property.name: contextId
property.label: Context ID
property.description: ID to pass to the Apex function when using logicReference.

property.name: tableDataString
property.label: Table Data (JSON String)
property.description: Input a collection of data as a JSON string. Only used if logicReference is not specified.

property.name: columnsString
property.label: Column Definitions
property.description: Define the table columns as a JSON string. Only used if logicReference is not specified. Example: [{'label':'Name', 'fieldName':'name'}]

property.name: keyField
property.label: Key Field
property.description: The API name of the unique identifier field in your data (e.g., 'Id' or 'id').

property.name: outputSelectedRowsString
property.label: Output Selected Rows
property.description: Outputs the selected rows as a JSON string to an Apex-defined collection variable.

property.name: maxRowSelection
property.label: Maximum Row Selection
property.description: Maximum number of rows that can be selected. Leave empty for unlimited selection.

property.name: maxHeight
property.label: Maximum Height (px)
property.description: Maximum height of the list in pixels. Leave empty to allow natural height.
